name: Dave Mead
description: I am an open person, honest, if I think something I say it. I never do something behind a person’s back,of course as a man i like to shop, read,love being outdoors in the warm weather. want just to be happy, laugh, have fun. i am a caring sensitive person. i am very helpful to those around me. i am a really good person. for me it is important. I am calm, lovely, I like love and to be loved, and communication.I enjoy so many things like aerobics, hiking, skiing, walking, candlelit dinners, gardening, reading, psychology, traveling, movies, theaters and concerts, restaurants, art galleries and exhibitions. I like to experience new things but also like to spend time with my family, play with my pet and decorate house.
